name: SCKOLB
description:
SKCOLB is a protoytpe where you have no control over the game hero actions, instead you play as you helping the protagonsit to get rid of colors blocks. Its a puzzle game that requires the player to use mouse and its buttons to destroy unuseful color pills/bullets, and optimize their arrival to the hero's gun, so he can shoot the right colors. 

Mouse: Move Visor

Mouse right button: Destroy pill/bullet

Mouse left button: Push pills to the right to gain space

Lose condition:

Block Colors touch the hero
